alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles northwest of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway to near Utah Test and Training Range North to 9 miles northeast of Wendover. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Lakeside, Gunnison Island and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
